CustomField.description: Query Params - comma separated user input
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Please provide the data in any of the following format. This will be reconciled and sent as request param. KEY-VALUE - Key1={!Name}& Key2=Michael& Key3={!$User.Name}& Key4={!$Organization.Name}& Key5={!$Setup.api_custom_setting__c.username__c}& Key6={0}& key7={!$CustomMetadata.Support_Tier__mdt.Bronze.field__c}
Please note - Only '&' should be used as a data separator
CustomField.label: Query Params
